name: Croud
description: Croud was set up in late 2011 and in that time have been credited with being Google's fastest growing agency for both 2013 and 2014 and the fastest agency to ever get Tier 1 Google support. We have a great bunch of clients including Interflora, Netflix, Regus, AMC, DKNY, Virgin Trains, Hiscox, Find My Past and more... Our key services include PPC, SEO, Display, Content, Social Ads and Analytics and we use the best marketing talent in the world to deliver this.
